summary:
SEC action has been against projects that are “obviously bad” and I don’t think this breaks that mold—that said, I’ve heard there are more worse things in the pipeline
Many projects may end up moving to a friendlier jurisdiction over regulatory concerns
The fact that jurisdiction still matters means that “defi” projects aren’t sufficiently decentralized yet, however a combination of projects in the pipeline may make these concerns moot
author: Eric Meltzer
The Block
title: Proof of Work: DeFi needs a little more "De"
